column4: Latest;Banteay Meanchey:------ At 8 pm on February 19
column6: a man died from a snake bite in Nam Tao commune
column10: was a 23-year-old man living in Ampil Kang village.------The man was bitten at around 3 pm on February 19
column12: when he and a friend were out hunting snakes. At first he did not seek medical attention
column13: and by the time he got to hospital it was too late to save him.------The victim’s body was returned to the family for a traditional funeral. ------POSTNEWS------As has ------previously been reported
column14: Banteay Meanchey------ province has a high number of recorded snake bites and deaths.
